thread.section_title: Optimalprint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optimalprint | optimalprint.ca
thread.title: Michele Makohoniuk

author: Michele Makohoniuk
title: Michele Makohoniuk
text:
I was EXTREMELY impressed. I inadvertently made a mistake on my invitation. I mentioned to them that the order was a donation for a handicapped couple that are getting married. They replaced the order free of charge. This is well above and beyond what I would have expected.
Thank you so much Optimalprint. This is heloping make their special day even more special.
